official_title: A bill to provide for the designation of a single ZIP code for Windsor Heights, Iowa.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing only the city of Windsor Heights, Iowa.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the designation of a single ZIP code for Windsor Heights, Iowa.
